TestCase.name: testExplainAlterTableCompactWithoutPartitionSpec
TestCase.Resource: LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.ManagedTable], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ManagedTable]], hints=[[[OPTIONS inheritPath:[] options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.ManagedTable], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ManagedTable]], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]])

TestCase.name: testExplainAlterTableCompactWithResolvedPartitionSpec
TestCase.Resource: ALTER TABLE ManagedTable PARTITION (b = 0, c = 'flink') COMPACT

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.ManagedTable], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ManagedTable]], hints=[[[OPTIONS inheritPath:[] options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.ManagedTable], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ManagedTable]], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]])

TestCase.name: testExplainAlterTableCompactWithUnorderedPartitionSpec
TestCase.Resource: ALTER TABLE ManagedTable PARTITION (c = 'flink', b = 0) COMPACT

LogicalSink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.ManagedTable], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]]) +- LogicalTableScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ManagedTable]], hints=[[[OPTIONS inheritPath:[] options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]])

Sink(table=[default_catalog.default_database.ManagedTable], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]]) +- TableSourceScan(table=[[default_catalog, default_database, ManagedTable]], fields=[a, b, c], hints=[[[OPTIONS options:{compact.file-entries={"compact-partitions":[{"resolved-partition-spec":{"b":"0","c":"flink"},"file-entries":["/foo/bar/file"]}]}, ENRICHED_KEY=ENRICHED_VALUE, compact.file-base-path=/foo/bar}]]])
